column5: Happy Birthday Lloyd!  May all the good will you have spread be returned to you 10 fold
I wished Lloyd a happy birthday last night just in case he was too old to get up this morning.
Happy Birthday, Lloyd, from myself and Juli!!!!!!!!!  Just remember you will always be one year older than me, LOL!!!! Best of luck with the salmon/trout this summer!
Happy B-Day Lloyd! I'll keep a lemon handy for the next time we meet up and we'll share a quick snort! HH
Happy Birthday, Lloyd! Was great fishing with you last Sunday with Frankie and Julie.
Happy Birthday Lloyd.  Hope you have a super day.  Joey
Happy Birthday bud   may the sun always shine on your boat
Happy Birthday Lloyd, hope you have a great one!
